objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Mystery/Detective lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to work and career in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about work and career using slang register
Students create original mystery themed content about work and career in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using slang register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in slang register within mystery theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
